name: bashconsultants
description: Helper package.json so Oryx detects a build script for Azure Static Web Apps

scripts.build: bash -lc 'if [ -n "$INPUT_AZURE_STATIC_WEB_APPS_API_TOKEN" ]; then BUNDLE_GEMFILE=Gemfile.azure bundle install && BUNDLE_GEMFILE=Gemfile.azure bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config.azure.yml -d _site; else bundle install && bundle exec jekyll build -d _site; fi'
scripts.build:azure: BUNDLE_GEMFILE=Gemfile.azure bundle install && BUNDLE_GEMFILE=Gemfile.azure bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config.azure.yml -d _site
